Question
========

Given the following numbers in a sample: 7, 1, 4, 8, 7, 3. The SEM (Standard Error of the Mean), the estimated standard deviation of the sample mean, is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.03
* 1.13
* 1.27
* 2.76

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.03: Incorrect
* 1.13: Correct
* 1.27: Incorrect
* 2.76: Incorrect
